caption.center: George M. MITCHELL v. L.B. HILBURN, Admr. of Estate of Tryon B. Allen,

opinion.posture: Appeal from Circuit Court, Warren County; Ben Guider, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Oscar P. LaBarre, Vicksburg, for appellant.
Teller, Biedenharn Rogers, Vicksburg, and Robert L. Netterville, Natchez, for appellee.
